about_the_game:
In this sweet and minimalist retro adventure, you'll help Detective Donut earn her desired black belt in the ancient art of Kung-Funghi. To do so, you'll need to complete the missions assigned by Master Bruce-Luu in six different environments, hand-carved pixel by pixel, progressing through the intermediate belts that will make you more and more agile!

With 21 fast-paced levels in arcade format, you'll guide the young doughnut through simple tasks such as sweeping the sacred halls, cleaning the gardens (and her own mind!), among other unusual and fun activities that require skillful movement. Follow the instructions provided at the start of each level and control the character's movement to interact with the objects in the environment with the keyboard to complete the objectives, and don't forget to check out the extra scenery that can be unlocked by completing the game!

Features:

- 21 separate stages in six different environments (plus bonus stage);
- Progress through each stage by completing the assigned task to conquer each of the six Kung-Funghi tracks and improve the character's agility;
- Hand-drawn retro pixel art;
- Achievement system;
- Exclusive original soundtrack;
- Manual save system (in the pause menu);
- Top-down camera.

Thanks and have a good game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 32bit +
  • Processor: Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit +
  • Processor: Intel / AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 mb
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

short_description: Detective Donut is at the sacred Shao-Lu temple, which preserves the ancient martial art of Kung-Funghi. Complete the objectives to progress through the ranks and win the coveted black belt! Oh, and watch out for the wasps...
supported_languages:
Portuguese - Brazil*, English*
*languages with full audio support
